articles.description: NOAA prediction models have confirmed that the fast-moving CME from yesterday’s solar flare eruption will strike the Earth. Know how deadly the incoming solar storm can be.
articles.content: Yesterday, it was reported that a long-duration solar flare eruption in the unstable sunspot region of AR3363 released a fast-moving coronal mass ejection (CME), that was found to be very intense. Ho… [+2280 chars]

articles.description: Proving his point further, the Under-23 wrestler said he had recently defeated American John Michael Diakomihalis by a comprehensive 8-2 margin while Bajrang had lost to the same wrestler by technical superiority in the World Championships last year.
